Issue.creator: sanchezl
Issue.summary: Use a fixed uid:gid in couchdb images.
Issue.description: CouchDB images currently create a {{couchdb}} user and group without specifying an explicit UID or GID. This results in the the next available UID and GID being used. In addition to not being deterministic, the low UID and GID picked almost certainly conflicts with an existing user on the host system.
